title: Learn about the ultimate trade up
author: EYECOLLECTVINTAGE

posts.post_title: Learn about the ultimate trade up
posts.post_content:
Ok so here it goes.
My name is Stephen if you don’t already know.  I started a thread in the Net54baseball Vintage (Pre-WWII) Baseball Cards & New Member Introductions  section called “The Ultimate Trade up”.  Feel free to go catch up on it when you get a chance, a grab a bag of pop corn because it’s filled with opinions.

Anyways, the point of the thread is that I started off with this card 
[URL=https://sportscardalbum.com/card/vogr3ea2/n-a][IMG]https://sportscardalbum.com/c/vogr3ea2.jpg[/IMG][/URL]   

And am attempting to trade all the way up to a 1952 Topps Mickey Mantle Rookie Card.
Here is where I stand at the moment….
Started with a Walter Johnson T-205 SGC 40.

Turned it into......

T206 Bender, no trees, psa 4 HOF SOLD $150
T206 McGraw, at hip, psa 3 HOF SOLD $110
T206 McGraw, port w/cap psa 2 HOF SOLD $110
T206 Chase, pink, psa3 SOLD $110


So far shipping has ran me $23.58 leaving me with $456.42 and the following cards/photos left for sale or trade.

T206 McGraw, finger air, psa2 HOF 
T206 Kelly, psa3 HOF
T206 Pelty, vert, psa 4.5
T206 McEvlveen, bvg 4
a very nice raw NM range 62 topps Mays AS card
T-206 Rube Marquard 
Honus Wagner Photo

See photos below

[URL=https://sportscardalbum.com/card/p8gpmjkp/n-a][IMG]https://sportscardalbum.com/c/p8gpmjkp.jpg[/IMG][/URL]   

[URL=https://sportscardalbum.com/card/84nr4yc2/n-a][IMG]https://sportscardalbum.com/c/84nr4yc2.jpg[/IMG][/URL]   

[URL=https://sportscardalbum.com/card/42zs5ex5/n-a][IMG]https://sportscardalbum.com/c/42zs5ex5.jpg[/IMG][/URL]   

[URL=https://sportscardalbum.com/card/4054h28m/n-a][IMG]https://sportscardalbum.com/c/4054h28m.jpg[/IMG][/URL]   

[URL=https://sportscardalbum.com/card/fq141999/n-a][IMG]https://sportscardalbum.com/c/fq141999.jpg[/IMG][/URL]   

[URL=https://sportscardalbum.com/card/5jti8h55/n-a][IMG]https://sportscardalbum.com/c/5jti8h55.jpg[/IMG][/URL]   

[URL=https://sportscardalbum.com/card/6r6xx5i8/n-a][IMG]https://sportscardalbum.com/c/6r6xx5i8.jpg[/IMG][/URL]   

[URL=https://sportscardalbum.com/card/xoji9j8y/n-a][IMG]https://sportscardalbum.com/c/xoji9j8y.jpg[/IMG][/URL]   

[URL=https://sportscardalbum.com/card/6yf2444x/n-a][IMG]https://sportscardalbum.com/c/6yf2444x.JPG[/IMG][/URL]   

[URL=https://sportscardalbum.com/card/86toh41r/n-a][IMG]https://sportscardalbum.com/c/86toh41r.JPG[/IMG][/URL]   

[URL=https://sportscardalbum.com/card/eip420xh/n-a][IMG]https://sportscardalbum.com/c/eip420xh.JPG[/IMG][/URL]   

[URL=https://sportscardalbum.com/card/4388s0s8/n-a][IMG]https://sportscardalbum.com/c/4388s0s8.JPG[/IMG][/URL]


I am looking to sell, but would trade up from anyone of these cards.
Here are a few examples of potential trade partners I am looking for…
1.You really need or want some of these cards, and have a card worth more; that you either have dupes of or lost a passion for.  Since my goal is to trade UP, I would be looking for something of more value (not picky at all as to what I get in return), yet you would be getting something you wanted more without coming out of pocket a dollar.

2.You have a beautiful card that is worth $1000 that you have been trying to sell for 2 years.  You simply have not found a buyer yet.  I have a card (s) that are easier for you to sell, so you make a trade taking a small hit knowing you can liquidate my cards quicker.


One major problem the thread seemed to generate has been someone people were rubbed the wrong way thinking I was looking for charity. Let me make it clear that I am not looking for charity. I am looking to trade up.  If the trade does not make sense for you then there is no point to do it obviously.  However, I am open to just about anything which really opens me up to basically any trade. Autographs, Cards, Photos, Etc Etc
Think you are a fit? PM ME or even post on my main thread and let’s get the ball rolling boys!!!! (and girls)
